lines: 1. Jokeyo ni kanye mondo tim tichMar kayo cham maber e piny marach?Pand keyo en adier mar Wach Nyasaye,To yueyo onge nyaka tich rumo.
Ere jokeyo? Ng`a ma nobiNi mond` oriwre e tich maber ni Ruoth?Ng`a ma nokonywa timo tichniMar kayo cham maber e puoth Ruoth?
2. Dhiuru udwargi e mier duto;Cham maber nitie kata buya ng`eny;Timuru teko, moro kik lalnu;To chokuru duto e mor mar Ruoth.
3. Puothe koro chiek kwonde duto te;Koro tich mar keyo oritowa;To jokeyo nok, kendo tich duong` ngang`;Kwatimo samuoyo cham biro lal.
4. Biuru koro, un yawuot dhano,Tiuru kanyakla mar choko cham;Tiuru matek nyaka Ruoth biro,Eka unudonji e mor mar Ruoth.
